resolution: Reset password via Forgot Password link. Check spam folder for reset email. Clear browser cache if issues persist.
Ensure device time is synced. Try backup codes. Contact support to reset 2FA if locked out.
Automatic refund processed within 5-10 business days. Usually a temporary authorization hold.
Settings > Billing > Payment Methods > Update Card. Old card removed after new one verified.
Settings > Billing > Cancel Subscription. Access continues until end of billing period. Data retained 30 days.
Disconnect and reconnect integration. Ensure correct Slack workspace selected. Check Slack permissions.
Verify calendar sync is enabled in Settings > Integrations. Check Google account permissions. Re-authenticate if needed.
Update to latest app version. Clear app cache. Restart device. Reinstall app if issues persist.
Clear browser cache. Try incognito mode. Disable browser extensions. Try different browser.
Custom fields available on Professional plan and above. Upgrade required for Starter/Free plans.
Time tracking available on Business plan and above. Check Settings > Features to enable if on eligible plan.
Check Trash in Settings. Projects recoverable for 30 days. Permanent deletion after 30 days.

issue_title: Need to export all project data
resolution: Settings > Export Data. Available in CSV format for all plans. PDF reports for Professional+.
Check project permissions. Ensure user is invited to specific project. Verify user role allows access.
Check plan user limits. Upgrade plan or remove inactive users to add new members.
